trans-unit.source: Defines the contract a Web Parts control implements to pass a parameter value in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 定義 Web 組件控制項實作在 Web 組件連接中傳遞參數值的合約。

trans-unit.source: Data is usually sent from a provider to a consumer in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 從提供者 Web 組件連接的取用者通常傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: However, in some cases, a provider needs a parameter from the consumer to determine which values it should send back.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在某些情況下，必須提供者從取用者，以判斷應傳回哪些值的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface defines members to implement that facilitate the passing of a parameter from a consumer to a provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>介面會定義成員來實作，以便參數可從取用者傳遞給提供者。

trans-unit.source: Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.
trans-unit.target: 轉換程式用來轉譯具有不相容的連接點的兩個 Web 組件控制項之間的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> object transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface when the provider needs a parameter from the consumer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>物件從轉換資料提供者實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>介面時，提供者需要從取用者的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A> method retrieves the data from the provider and provides a callback method to process the data for the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A>方法從提供者擷取資料，並提供回呼方法以處理這些資料取用者。

trans-unit.source: The callback method can be a customized method within the consumer that sets the return values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法可以取用者會隨之設定的傳回值中的自訂的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method to call to process the data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫以處理提供者之資料的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the data from the connection provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得連接提供者的資料值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A> method is used to retrieve the values from the provider based on a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A>方法用來擷取參數為基礎的提供者的值。

trans-unit.source: The method represented by the `callback` parameter processes the data for use by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的方法`callback`參數處理資料以供取用者使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property descriptors for the data to be received by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 取得要由消費者接收之資料的屬性描述子。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.Schema%2A> property provides property information for the data passed by the interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.Schema%2A>屬性提供介面所傳遞之資料的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Transformer and consumer controls can query this property to get information about the type, contents, and other details of the field contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface instance.
trans-unit.target: Transformer 和取用者的控制項可以查詢這個屬性，以取得內容類型的相關資訊和其他詳細資料的欄位中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>介面執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Sets the property descriptors for the properties that the consumer receives when calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ParametersCallback)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ParametersCallback)" /> 方法時，設定消費者所接收屬性的屬性描述子。
